description.en:
Force For Fast” (FFF) is a car community that uses blockchain as the underlying technology. It is a sports entertainment, social, and life style platform dedicated to car enthusiasts and car racing fans.

The core products include the world’s first blockchain sandbox strategy racing game, which uses the global map as a sandbox to reflect the most realistic roads, maps commercial services and institutions in the real automobile market, and refers to relevant rules of automobile events to allow users to feel the real world in a virtual community.

All vehicles and industries (gas stations, comprehensive dealers, etc.) in FFF are users ’digital assets (NFTs). Users can purchase, upgrade and modify their dream cars to participate in the championship glory of the major virtual car events, gallop freely on the real global map, and enjoy the touch of thrilling competitive pleasure. This allows players to enjoy token rewards and value rewards while having fun online and making friends.
